messages.content: Show me TCS quarterly results for last 4 quarters including revenue, profit, margins and also show key ratios like EPS, book value, dividend per share

Here are the TCS quarterly results for the last 4 quarters:

**TCS Quarterly Results:**

| Quarter | Revenue (Rs. Cr.) | Net Profit (Rs. Cr.) | Margin (%) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Q3 FY26 (Dec-25) | 59,692 | 10,190 | 17.1% |
| Q2 FY26 (Sep-25) | 59,229 | 11,053 | 18.7% |
| Q1 FY26 (Jun-25) | 58,463 | 11,828 | 20.2% |
| Q4 FY25 (Mar-25) | 61,237 | 12,552 | 20.5% |

**Key Ratios:**

| Ratio | Q3 FY26 (Dec-25) | Q2 FY26 (Sep-25) | Q1 FY26 (Jun-25) | Q4 FY25 (Mar-25) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| EPS (Rs.) | 34.44 | 37.38 | 40.04 | 42.65 |
| Book Value (Rs.) | 224.11 | 221.15 | 217.41 | 214.41 |
| Dividend per Share (Rs.) | 9.00 | 9.00 | 8.00 | 8.00 |

**Source:**

* TCS Quarterly Results: [TCS Investor Relations](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements)
* TCS Quarterly Results (PDF): [Q3 FY26 Fact Sheet](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/Presentations/Q3%202025-26%20Fact%20Sheet.pdf)
* Key Ratios: [Moneycontrol](https://www.moneycontrol.com/financials/tataconsultancyservices/ratiosvi/tcs) and [Trendlyne](https://trendlyne.com/fundamentals/quarterly-results/1372/TCS/tata-consultancy-services-ltd/)

Please note that the data may not be up-to-date, and you should verify it with the company's official website or other reliable sources for the most recent information.
